data.title: Wilco
data.text:
If you get the chance to see Jeff Tweedy solo acoustic (with special guest Elizabeth Moen!!), you better take it.

Tickets for shows from Upstate NY to Upstate CA are on sale now!

10/11/2024 Woodstock NY Bearsville Theater 10/12/2024 Woodstock NY Bearsville Theater 10/13/2024 Woodstock NY Bearsville Theater 10/15/2024 Buffalo NY Buffalo State PAC 10/16/2024 Columbus OH Southern Theatre 10/18/2024 Champaign IL Virginia Theatre 10/19/2024 Madison WI Barrymore Theatre 10/20/2024 Omaha NE The Admiral Theater 10/22/2024 Jackson WY The Center 10/23/2024 Salt Lake City UT Rose Wagner Theater 10/25/2024 Grass Valley CA The Center for The Arts

10/26/2024 Mill Valley CA Sweetwater Music Hall 10/28/2024 Menlo Park CA The Guild Theatre 10/29/2024 Menlo Park CA The Guild Theatre 10/30/2024 Menlo Park CA The Guild Theatre

Learn More Here.

Photo Credit: Akash Wadhwani

Solid Sound is unforgettable‚Ä¶ but when you need a reminder download complete audio sets of Wilco ‚ÄúDEEP CUTS‚Äù from Friday Night, the band‚Äôs sneaky Saturday night A Ghost Is Born celebration and Jeff Tweedy‚Äôs festival-closing Sunday performance.

New ROADCASES are available now (poster bundle optional but encouraged)!

Wilco‚Äôs new EP is streaming now! üçí Listen here.

Better yet, preorder a vinyl or CD or T-shirt. TBD on shipping! Because we‚Äôre picking one of YOUR designs for the final cover art. Stay tuned for more.

Hot Sun Cool Shroud features six new tracks from Wilco that have a summertime-after-dark kind of feeling.

‚ÄúIt starts off pretty hot, like heat during the day, has some instrumentals on it that are a little agitated and uncomfortable and ends with a cooling breeze. There are tracks on Hot Sun Cool Shroud that are more aggressive and angular than anything we‚Äôve put out in a while, and a song about love melting you like ice cream into a puddle of sugary soup. All the pieces of summer, including the broody cicadas.‚Äù ‚Äì Jeff Tweedy

Lace up your skates and meet Wilco at The Rink.

The band‚Äôs new music video for ‚ÄúMeant To Be‚Äù is out now.

It was shot at The (legendary) Rink on Chicago‚Äôs Southside, the video highlights JB Skating, a smooth dance style of skating that started in the early ‚Äô70s. Picture synchronized group movements to James Brown tunes (hence the ‚ÄúJB‚Äù) under disco ball lights. ü™©

Watch now. And replay again and again. No Wilcos were harmed in the making of this video üõº

Photo of Darius Sanders by Akash Wadhwani

Nothing (Nothing, Nothing, Nothing at all) beats flipping through the bins; support your local store and make some new friends. After all, ‚Äúwithout these stores, there‚Äôs just no way Wilco would still be around.‚Äù ‚Äì Jeff Tweedy

The latest from Wilco: A stunning version of the band‚Äôs legendary 2011 album, The Whole Love. Now on three LPs, expanded to include all related single, EP and bonus tracks plus a selection from The Loft‚Äôs archive of live in-studio performances and previously unreleased alternate mixes and demos. This special Record Store Day 2024 release includes Wilco classics ‚ÄúArt of Almost‚Äù, ‚ÄúDawned on Me‚Äù, ‚ÄúSunloathe‚Äù and many others.

Find participating record stores here.

Our Front of House series on nugs.net explores Wilco‚Äôs 25+ years of live catalog, past and present. The series includes exclusive recordings released on the last Wednesday of November, February, May and August.

The February 2024 release is from 2008, a killer closing night of tour from Des Moines, IA on March 9. Download the 27-song set and listen here.

Recordings by Warner Swain

For years we called it ‚ÄúBook 3‚Äù. Now it‚Äôs more formally named WORLD WITHIN A SONG: Music That Changed My Life and Life That Changed My Music. ‚ÄúWWAS‚Äù for short.

Whatever you call it, Jeff Tweedy‚Äôs 3rd book available now via Dutton. Order here!

When we asked Jeff about the book, he said: ‚ÄúI want to talk about songs that gave me permission to be creative‚Ä¶to be myself. To say something that was hard to say. I‚Äôll be telling stories from my life, focusing on a true-to-memory style of how it really felt to me, how I experienced things emotionally. And then I want to talk about music in the same way. I want to talk about music in a way that it rarely gets talked about. I want to talk about the world within the song.‚Äù

Wilco‚Äôs new album, Cruel Country, is available now on vinyl and CD.

Available on 2-LP (black and color vinyl) or 2-CD. Both feature 21 songs including early fan favorite, ‚ÄúA Lifetime to Find,‚Äù which was shared via a spo0oooky new music video!

Wilco‚Äôs 12th album has had a heck of a ride so far. Originally given digitally to Solid Sound participants for free, followed by a digital release May 27 (the same day the band performed it live in its entirety at the festival). Lauded by NYT as Wilco‚Äôs ‚Äúunderstated Magnum Opus‚Äù and later released on Record Store Day as a white label CD. Now it lands in good company on the best of 2022 lists from Rolling Stone, Variety, Spin, Uproxx, and Paste AND its long awaited physical release is nearly here!

ORDER NOW: Wilco Store (US | EU | AUS)

Good news! We finally got our hands on some extra press time to reprint Sky Blue Sky!

A limited-edition pressing on sky blue vinyl is available now.

Wilco Store: North America

Side 1: Either Way / You Are My Face / Impossible Germany

Side 2: Sky Blue Sky / Side with the Seeds / Shake It Off

Side 3: Please Be Patient With Me / Hate It Here / Leave Me (Like You Found Me)

Side 4: Walken / What Light / On and On and On

20 years later, Yankee Hotel Foxtrot has been awarded with TWO Grammys! The list of thank you‚Äôs is too long to dole out.

Seven(!) Yankee Hotel Foxtrot Deluxe Reissues are available now! Get vinyl and CDs at your local record shop or online (US | EU | AUS). Or dig in digitally on all of the usual streaming services and Bandcamp.

There‚Äôs something for everyone: the original album remastered on black or gold vinyl; an expanded digital download; a deluxe vinyl/cd with live tracks and demos; plus a Super Deluxe Boxset featuring 82 previously-unreleased tracks. Check here for all the details. You‚Äôll also find shiny new packaging, unseen photos, new interviews, and of course, merch to match!

The Wilco Store: North America | UK / EU | AUS

Get WARM / WARMER, Love is the King / Live is the King, and Sukierae by Jeff Tweedy! Available now in the Wilco Stores.

WARMER is the companion release to WARM and was previously released as a RSD exclusive. Live is the King is an expanded package featuring studio and live versions of all 11 songs played by Jeff with a full band. The live set closes with a cover version of Neil Young‚Äôs classic ‚ÄúThe Old Country Waltz‚Äù. Sukierae is a CLASSIC.

US Wilco Store | EU Wilco Store | AUS Wilco Store

We‚Äôre constantly updating Wilcostore.com with new fun items. The latest release is a throwback!

The Wilco 3D Viewfinder is a crossover between one of childhood‚Äôs best toys and one of America‚Äôs best bands. Each 3D Viewfinder comes with 3 reels, each containing 7 Wilco images. The Loft Reel takes a closer look at the band‚Äôs iconic Chicago studio, The Green Room Reel shows rare backstage snaps, and the Live Sessions Reel gets up close with the band members on stage.

Shop US ‚Äì Shop EU ‚Äì Shop AUS

We know what you‚Äôre thinking. The answer is: No, Jeff doesn‚Äôt stop making music.

Which means you‚Äôre in luck, because there are two new tracks available now as part of Sub Pop‚Äôs Singles Club.

‚ÄúC‚Äômon America,‚Äù the A-side, is from an unreleased group of songs with mostly sci-fi lyrics. Meanwhile ‚ÄúUR-60 Unsent,‚Äù the B-side, is a pitiful tale of an unsent lovesick mixtape, taken from a separate batch of unreleased songs with mostly pitiful lyrics.

Listen / order here.

Cover photo by Sammy Tweedy

‚ÄúThere is and was only one Daniel and to be able to work with him and help present his music was a huge honor for me and the band, one for which we are all very thankful.‚Äù ‚Äì Jeff Tweedy

Daniel Johnston‚Äôs final album, Chicago 2017, is available now via Wilco‚Äôs own dBpm Records: Spotify | Apple Music | Amazon Music | Vinyl

Via sales in the Wilco store, we were able to donate $7,000 to the Johnston family‚Äôs ‚ÄúHi How Are You‚Äù Foundation for the study and treatment of mental illness and addiction recovery.

Check in with Jeff from The Loft as he performs a unique take of a Wilco fan-favorite for the second installment of Fender‚Äôs Re-Creation series.

For those who are curious: In this video, Jeff uses an American Acoustasonic Jazzmaster. You can learn more about the guitar here.

Photo by Zoran Orlic

Video by Picture Show

Jeff Tweedy‚Äôs second book, How To Write One Song: Loving The Things We Create and How They Love Us Back is out now.

Esquire hit the nail on the head: ‚Äú[How to Write One Song] is one part manual for composing a song, and one part philosophical inquiry into the human desire‚Äîthe human need‚Äîto create. It‚Äôs also an easy, delightful read.‚Äù

This is the perfect gift for your kid, or your inner child. What are you waiting for? Get creating:

US | UK | EU | Audio book read by Jeff

‚Äì Read an essay on the book by Los Angeles Review of Books

We‚Äôd like to congratulate Jeff Tweedy and Lawrence Azzerad (while thanking the Academy) for the new hardware. The Ode to Joy Deluxe Art Book took home this year‚Äôs Grammy for Best Packaging.

Created with the Wilco collector in mind, OTJ Deluxe is beautifully hand-crafted, autographed and hand-numbered. It includes a pop-up art book paired with a 180g vinyl. Copies are available here.

Wilco‚Äôs 11th studio album was released on October 5, 2019 via dBpm Records and is available now, in stores, online and on streaming services.

Ode to Joy features 11 new songs including the single, ‚ÄúLove is Everywhere.‚Äù

Happy Listening!

Share The Wealth, a spankin‚Äô new, multi-faceted document played by a sublimely-expanded edition of my long-standing combo called The Nels Cline Singers is out now.

‚ÄúAnyone out there hankering for a rather elaborate elucidation of sonic architecture in the jazz/rock/improv universe at this time? I hope so, but I truly understand if not. Creations get created and plans to provide these creations to you, the ardent listeners, get planned, and so here I am/we are with Share The Wealth. I am, in spite of so many concerning non-musical occurrences that assail us all at this time, truly happy and proud to announce the imminent release of this double album.‚Äù ‚Äì NC

Listen to Share The Wealth

Previously out-of-print, Pat‚Äôs book ‚Äú100 Polaroids‚Äù is now available to order. A portion of proceeds will be donated to MusiCares.

‚Äú10 years ago I put together this book to commemorate an exhibit at the first Solid Sound Festival‚Ä¶ an exhibit of 100 photographs chosen from the thousands I had taken in the previous few years. I had just begun to look at preparing this reprint when COVID emerged, and was on the fence about whether or not to move forward with the endeavor. But I decided that I‚Äôd rather continue to stay involved in creative pursuits and share it with others‚Ä¶‚Äù

Available here.

In December 2019, amid Wilco‚Äôs Winterlude residency in Chicago, the band played a surprise show ‚Äì followed by a Q+A with Jeff moderated by TJ Jagodowski ‚Äì from the CAA‚Äôs vintage basketball court.

During these strange times, we hope this is a welcome distraction.

Watch in full here.

Jeff‚Äôs NYT‚Äôs best-selling memoir, Let‚Äôs Go (So We Can Get Back), is available now on hardcover and paperback.

For the first time, Jeff takes fans into his songwriting process, talks about his childhood, speaks in-depth about his collaborators in Uncle Tupelo, Wilco, and more.

US | UK

Take a break from the TV.

Watch Wilco‚Äôs Ode to Joy tour live from Brooklyn Steel on Oct. 13 2019.

The band is on tour now. Tickets are available here.

Photo by Zoran Orlic
